name: A hammer for mining
description: The mod adds an advanced hammer for fast and efficient block mining by area.

name: Aerial Magic and Dungeons
description: With the mod, various abilities based on air magic will appear.

name: Katanas
description: The katana does not have high damage, but it can be thrown to move quickly in space.

name: Explosive blocks
description: Now you can play practical jokes on your friends with various booby traps.

name: Urban infrastructure
description: Expand the possibilities of construction by adding unique blocks, ideal for creating realistic urban landscapes.

name: The Burning Nether World
description: Here you will find new mobs, unique blocks, rare resources and powerful weapons that can only be obtained in the burning depths of hell.

name: Food blocks and furniture
description: The game will feature new food blocks: pizza, plates, cups, bowls, cutlery, kitchen tools, and even a wedding cake.

name: Island of Sweets
description: A fabulous biome where everything is made of sweets â€” from the ground to the trees. This is a real paradise for lovers of desserts, color and creativity!

name: Lightning Magic
description: Immerse yourself in battles, hitting enemies with powerful blows, and use heavenly power to soar into the air and conquer lands.

name: Cat Armor
description: A unique armor in the form of a cat suit, which has diamond strength.

name: Lamps and lanterns
description: Wooden lamps, copper lanterns and other types of light sources.

name: Dark Magic
description: Use powerful spells to subdue enemies, take away their eyesight and spread fear.

name: Frost Magic
description: Unleash your hidden cold magic abilities and aim them at your enemies.

name: Monsters from the Depths
description: Now every corner of the cubic world hides unique types of undead, adapted to their conditions.
